anya-e0809n1:12_0: Jino, sakko tu siddhattho, suddhodani ca gotamo.
anya-e0809n1:14_0: Sakyasīho tathā sakya, muni cādiccabandhu ca;
anya-e0809n1:16_0: Mokkho nirodho nibbānaṁ, dīpo taṇhakkhayo paraṁ;
anya-e0809n1:17_0: Tāṇaṁ leṇa marūpañca, santaṁ sacca manālayaṁ.
anya-e0809n1:24_0: Dukkhakkhayo byābajjhañca byāpajjaṁ (ṭīkā), vivaṭṭaṁ khema kevalaṁ;
anya-e0809n1:25_0: Apavaggo virāgo ca, paṇīta maccutaṁ padaṁ.
anya-e0809n1:27_0: Yogakkhemo pāra mapi, mutti santi visuddhiyo;
anya-e0809n1:30_0: Khīṇāsavo tva’sekkho ca, vītarāgo tathā’ rahā;
anya-e0809n1:34_0: Tidasā tva’marā devā, vibudhā ca sudhāsino;
anya-e0809n1:35_0: Surā marū divokā cā, matapā saggavāsino.
anya-e0809n1:37_1: apume devatāni ca devatā eva devatāni, sakatthe nipaccayo (ṭīkā);
anya-e0809n1:39_0: Siddho bhūto ca gandhabbo, guyhako yakkha rakkhasā;
anya-e0809n1:48_0: Vāsudevo hari harī (ṭīkā) kaṇho, kesavo cakkapāṇya’tha;
anya-e0809n1:51_0: Haro vutto kumāro tu, khandho sattidharo bhave;
anya-e0809n1:53_0: Sakko purindado deva, rājā vajirapāṇi ca;
anya-e0809n1:57_0: Suranātho ca vajira, hattho ca bhūtapatya’pi.
anya-e0809n1:60_0: Viḍojo tha sujā tassa sujātā’ssa (ṭīkā), bhariyā tha puraṁ bhave.
anya-e0809n1:62_0: Masakkasārā masakkasāro (sī.) vassoka, sārā cevā’ marāvatī;
anya-e0809n1:68_0: Erāvaṇo gajo paṇḍu, kambalo tu silāsanaṁ.
anya-e0809n1:71_0: Nandanaṁ missakaṁ citta, latā phārusakaṁ vanā.
anya-e0809n1:77_0: Vimāno nitthiyaṁ byamhaṁ, pīyūsaṁ tvamataṁ sudhā;
anya-e0809n1:78_0: Sineru meru tidivā, dhāro neru sumeru ca.
anya-e0809n1:86_0: Kapparukkho tu santānā, dayo devaddumā siyuṁ.
anya-e0809n1:88_0: Pācī patījhu’ dīci’tthī, pubba pacchima uttarā;
anya-e0809n1:91_1: amarakose pana erāvato eva atthi puṇḍarīko, vāmano kumudo’ ñjano;
anya-e0809n1:94_0: Dhataraṭṭho ca gandhabbā, dhipo, kumbhaṇḍasāmi tu;
anya-e0809n1:101_0: Jātavedo sikhī joti, pāvako dahano’ nalo;
anya-e0809n1:102_0: Hutāvaho’ ccimā dhūma, ketva’ggi gini bhānumā.
anya-e0809n1:104_0: Tejo dhūmasikho vāyu, sakho ca kaṇhavattanī;
anya-e0809n1:115_0: Gandhavāho tathā vāyo, samīro ca sadāgati.
anya-e0809n1:117_0: Vāyubhedā ime chu’ddha, ṅgamo cādhogamo tathā;
anya-e0809n1:123_0: Vego javo rayo khippaṁ, tu sīghaṁ turitaṁ lahu;
anya-e0809n1:124_0: Āsu tuṇṇa maraṁ cāvi, lambitaṁ tuvaṭaṁpi ca.
anya-e0809n1:127_0: Bhusa matisayo ca daḷhaṁ, tibbe’kantā’timatta, bāḷhāni;
anya-e0809n1:128_0: Khippādī paṇḍake dabbe, dabbagā tesu ye tisu.
anya-e0809n1:130_0: Aviggaho tu kāmo ca, manobhū madano bhave;
anya-e0809n1:131_0: Antako vasavattī ca, pāpimā ca pajāpati.
anya-e0809n1:133_0: Pamattabandhu kaṇho ca, māro namuci, tassa tu;
anya-e0809n1:134_0: Taṇhā’ratī ragā dhītū, hatthī tu girimekhalo.
anya-e0809n1:137_0: Vepacitti pulomo ca, kimpuriso tu kinnaro.
anya-e0809n1:148_0: Abbhaṁ tīsvatha vassañca, vassanaṁ vuṭṭhi nāriyaṁ;
anya-e0809n1:151_0: Meghanāde tu dhanitaṁ, gajjitaṁ rasitādi ca;
anya-e0809n1:159_0: Indu cando ca nakkhatta, rājā somo nisākaro.
anya-e0809n1:162_0: Sītaraṁsi nisānātho, uḷurājā ca mā pume.
anya-e0809n1:164_0: Kalā soḷasamo bhāgo, bimbaṁ tu maṇḍalaṁ bhave;
anya-e0809n1:165_0: Aḍḍho tvaddho upaḍḍho ca, vā khaṇḍaṁ sakalaṁ pume.
anya-e0809n1:167_0: Addhaṁ vuttaṁ same bhāge, pasādo tu pasannatā;
anya-e0809n1:168_0: Komudī candikā juṇhā, kanti sobhā juti cchavi.
anya-e0809n1:171_0: Cihanaṁ cāpi sobhā tu, paramā susamā tha ca.
anya-e0809n1:173_0: Sītaṁ guṇe, guṇiliṅgā, sīta sisira sītalā;
anya-e0809n1:174_0: Himaṁ tuhina mussāvo, nīhāro mahikā pyatha.
anya-e0809n1:176_0: Nakkhattaṁ joti bhaṁ tārā, apume tārako’ḷu ca;
anya-e0809n1:181_0: Māghā magha (sī.) ca phaggunī dve ca, hatthā cittā ca svātipi;
anya-e0809n1:182_0: Visākhā’ nurādhā jeṭṭhā, mūlā’ sāḷhā duve tathā.
anya-e0809n1:187_0: Sobbhānu kathito rāhu, sūrādī tu navaggahā;
anya-e0809n1:188_0: Rāsi mesādiko bhadda, padā poṭṭhapadā samā.
anya-e0809n1:194_0: Raṁsimā bhākaro bhānu, akko sahassaraṁsi ca.
anya-e0809n1:196_0: Raṁsi ābhā pabhā ditti, ruci bhā juti dīdhiti;
anya-e0809n1:197_0: Marīci dvīsu bhānvaṁ’su, mayūkho kiraṇo karo.
anya-e0809n1:209_0: Dasa khaṇamuhutto te, divaso tu ahaṁ dinaṁ.
anya-e0809n1:215_0: Nisā ca rajanī ratti, tiyāmā saṁvarī bhave;
anya-e0809n1:219_0: Andhakāro tamo nitthī, timisaṁ timiraṁ mataṁ.
anya-e0809n1:222_0: Vanasaṇḍo ghano megha, paṭalaṁ cā’ḍḍharatti ca.
anya-e0809n1:225_0: Pāṭipado tu dutiyā, tatiyādī tithītithi, tāyati pāletīti tithi, tā+iti (ṇvādi) dvisu.
anya-e0809n1:230_0: Ghaṭikā saṭṭhya’ horatto, pakkho te dasa pañca ca;
anya-e0809n1:234_0: Citto vesākha, jeṭṭho cā, sāḷho dvīsu ca sāvaṇo;
anya-e0809n1:237_0: Māgasiro tathā phusso, kamena māgha phagguṇā;
anya-e0809n1:244_0: Kamā hemanta gimhāna, vassānā utuyo dvisu.
anya-e0809n1:247_0: Cha vā vasanto ca gimha vassānā;
anya-e0809n1:248_0: Saradoti kamā māsā, dve dve vuttānusārena.
anya-e0809n1:255_0: Vassa saṁvaccharā nitthī, sarado hāyano samā.
anya-e0809n1:257_0: Kappakkhayo tu saṁvaṭṭo, yuganta palayā api;
anya-e0809n1:262_0: Pāpañca kibbisaṁ verā, ghaṁ duccarita dukkaṭaṁ;
anya-e0809n1:265_0: Kusalaṁ sukataṁ sukkaṁ, puññaṁ dhamma manitthiyaṁ;
anya-e0809n1:272_0: Hāso’ ttamanatā pīti, vitti tuṭṭhi ca nāriyaṁ;
anya-e0809n1:275_0: Pāmojjañca pamodo tha, sukhaṁ sātañca phāsva’tha;
anya-e0809n1:276_0: Bhaddaṁ seyyo subhaṁ khemaṁ, kalyāṇaṁ maṅgalaṁ sivaṁ.
anya-e0809n1:278_0: Dukkhañca kasiraṁ kicchaṁ, nīgho ca byasanaṁ aghaṁ;
anya-e0809n1:279_0: Dabbe tu pāpapuññāni, tīsvākicchaṁ sukhādi ca.
anya-e0809n1:281_0: Bhāgyaṁ niyati bhāgo ca, bhāgadheyyaṁ vidhī’rito;
anya-e0809n1:282_0: Atho uppatti nibbatti, jāti janana mubbhavo.
anya-e0809n1:284_0: Nimittaṁ kāraṇaṁ ṭhānaṁ, padaṁ bījaṁ nibandhanaṁ;
anya-e0809n1:285_0: Nidānaṁ pabhavo hetu, sambhavo setu paccayo.
anya-e0809n1:287_0: Kāraṇaṁ yaṁ samāsannaṁ, padaṭṭhānanti taṁ mataṁ;
anya-e0809n1:288_0: Jīvo tu puriso’ttā tha, padhānaṁ pakatitthiyaṁ.
anya-e0809n1:290_0: Pāṇo sarīrī bhūtaṁ vā, satto dehī ca puggalo;
anya-e0809n1:294_0: Rūpaṁ saddo gandha rasā, phasso dhammo ca gocarā;
anya-e0809n1:295_0: Ālambā visayā te chā, rammaṇā lambaṇāni ca.
anya-e0809n1:311_0: Kaḷāro kapilo nīla, pīte tha rocanappabhe;
anya-e0809n1:312_0: Piṅgo pisaṅgo pyathavā, kaḷārādī tu piṅgale.
anya-e0809n1:318_0: Naccaṁ naṭṭañca naṭanaṁ, nattanaṁ lāsanaṁ bhave;
anya-e0809n1:319_0: Naccaṁ tu vāditaṁ gīta, miti nāṭumidaṁ tayaṁ.
anya-e0809n1:324_0: Siṅgāro karuṇo vīra, bbhuta hassa bhayānakā;
anya-e0809n1:325_0: Santo bībhaccha ruddāni, nava nāṭyarasā ime.
anya-e0809n1:327_0: Posassa nāriyaṁ pose, itthiyā saṅgamaṁ pati;
anya-e0809n1:334_0: Bhāsitaṁ lapitaṁ bhāsā, vohāro vacanaṁ vaco;
anya-e0809n1:341_0: Hāse soke pasāde ca, kare āmeḍitaṁ budho.
anya-e0809n1:343_0: Iru nārī yaju sāma, miti vedā tayo siyuṁ;
anya-e0809n1:344_0: Ete eva tayī nārī, vedo manto sutitthiyaṁ.
anya-e0809n1:346_0: Aṭṭhako vāmako vāma, devo caṅgīraso bhagu;
anya-e0809n1:347_0: Yamadaggi ca vāsiṭṭho, bhāradvājo ca kassapo;
anya-e0809n1:350_0: Kappo byākaraṇaṁ joti, satthaṁ sikkhā nirutti ca;
anya-e0809n1:356_0: Vitaṇḍasatthaṁ viññeyyaṁ, yaṁ taṁ lokāyataṁ iti;
anya-e0809n1:357_0: Keṭubhaṁ tu kriyākappa, vikappo kavinaṁ hito.
anya-e0809n1:362_0: Saññā, khyā, vhā samaññā cā, bhidhānaṁ nāma mavhayo;
anya-e0809n1:365_0: Pañho tīsva nuyogo ca, pucchā pyatha nidassanaṁ;
anya-e0809n1:368_0: Samā saṅkhepa saṁhārā, samāso saṅgaho pyatha;
anya-e0809n1:371_0: Vohāro tu vivādo tha, sapanaṁ sapathopi ca;
anya-e0809n1:376_0: Katthanā ca silāghā ca, vaṇṇanā ca nuti tthuti.
anya-e0809n1:378_0: Thomanañca thomanaṁ vā (katthaci thomanaṁ thomanā dviliṅge) pasaṁsātha, kekā nādo sikhaṇḍinaṁ;
anya-e0809n1:382_0: Pariyāyo vevacanaṁ, sākacchā tu ca saṁkathā;
anya-e0809n1:386_0: Khepo nindā tathā kucchā, jigucchā garahā bhave;
anya-e0809n1:403_0: Vitathaṁ tu musā cātha āhataṁ tu musātthakaṁ (katthaci, amarakose), pharusādī tiliṅgikā.
anya-e0809n1:405_0: Sammā byayañcā vitathaṁ, saccaṁ tacchaṁ yathātathaṁ;
anya-e0809n1:406_0: Tabbantā tīsva līkaṁ tva, saccaṁ micchā musā byayaṁ.
anya-e0809n1:414_0: Bindu gambhīra ninnādī, tyeva maṭṭhaṅgiko saro.
anya-e0809n1:420_0: Sarā satta tayo gāmā, cekavīsati mucchanā;
anya-e0809n1:423_0: Usabho dhevato ceva, chajja gandhāra majjhimā;
anya-e0809n1:424_0: Pañcamo ca nisādoti, satte’te gaditā sarā.
anya-e0809n1:426_0: Nadanti usabhaṁ gāvo, turagā dhevataṁ tathā;
anya-e0809n1:427_0: Chajjaṁ mayūrā gandhāra, majā koñcā ca majjhimaṁ.
anya-e0809n1:433_0: Saresu tesu pacceke, tisso tisso hi mucchanā;
anya-e0809n1:434_0: Siyuṁ tatheva tānāni ṭhānāni (bahūsu), satta satteva labbhare.
anya-e0809n1:436_0: Tisso duve catasso ca, catasso kamato sare;
anya-e0809n1:437_0: Tisso duve catassoti, dvāvīsati sutī siyuṁ.
anya-e0809n1:439_0: Uccatare rave tāro, thābyatte madhure kalo;
anya-e0809n1:440_0: Gambhīre tu rave mando, tārādī tīsvatho kale;
anya-e0809n1:444_0: Vīṇā ca vallakī satta, tantī sā parivādinī;
anya-e0809n1:458_0: Ātojjaṁ tu ca vādittaṁ, vāditaṁ vajja muccate.
anya-e0809n1:469_0: So tvā modo dūragāmī, vissantā tīsvito paraṁ.
anya-e0809n1:471_0: Iṭṭhagandho ca surabhi, sugandho ca sugandhi ca;
anya-e0809n1:472_0: Pūtigandhi tu duggandho, tha vissaṁ āmagandhi yaṁ.
anya-e0809n1:477_0: Kasāvo nitthiyaṁ titto, madhuro lavaṇo ime;
anya-e0809n1:478_0: Ambilo kaṭuko ceti, cha rasā tabbatī tisu.
anya-e0809n1:482_0: Nayanaṁ tvakkhi nettañca, locanaṁ ca’cchi cakkhu ca.
anya-e0809n1:484_0: Sotaṁ saddaggaho kaṇṇo, savanaṁ suti natthu tu;
anya-e0809n1:485_0: Nāsā ca nāsikā ghānaṁ, jivhātu rasanā bhave.
anya-e0809n1:487_0: Sarīraṁ vapu gattañcā, ttabhāvo bondi viggaho;
anya-e0809n1:488_0: Dehaṁ vā purise kāyo, thiyaṁ tanu kaḷevaraṁ.
anya-e0809n1:490_0: Cittaṁ ceto mano nitthī, viññāṇaṁ hadayaṁ tathā;
anya-e0809n1:491_0: Mānasaṁ dhī tu paññā ca, buddhi medhā mati muti.
anya-e0809n1:493_0: Bhūrī mantā ca paññāṇaṁ, ñāṇaṁ vijjā ca yoni ca;
anya-e0809n1:497_0: Sampajaññaṁ tu nepakkaṁ, vedayitaṁ tu vedanā.
anya-e0809n1:501_0: Ekaggatā tu samatho, avikkhepo samādhi ca.
anya-e0809n1:503_0: Ussāhā’ tappa paggāhā, vāyāmo ca parakkamo;
anya-e0809n1:504_0: Padhānaṁ vīriyaṁ cehā, uyyāmo ca dhiti tthiyaṁ.
anya-e0809n1:509_0: Ussoḷhī tva dhimattehā, sati tva nussati tthiya;
anya-e0809n1:510_0: Lajjā hirī samānā tha, ottappaṁ pāpabhīrutā.
anya-e0809n1:516_0: Dayā’ nukampā kāruññaṁ, karuṇā ca anuddayā;
anya-e0809n1:517_0: Thiyaṁ veramaṇī ceva, viratyā’ rati cāpyatha.
anya-e0809n1:519_0: Titikkhā khanti khamanaṁ, khamā mettā tu metya’tha;
anya-e0809n1:520_0: Dassanaṁ diṭṭhi laddhitthī, siddhanto samayo bhave.
anya-e0809n1:522_0: Taṇhā ca tasiṇā ejā, jālinī ca visattikā;
anya-e0809n1:523_0: Chando jaṭā nikantyā’sā, sibbinī bhavanetti ca.
anya-e0809n1:525_0: Abhijjhā vanatho vānaṁ, lobho rāgo ca ālayo;
anya-e0809n1:526_0: Pihā manoratho icchā, bhilāso kāma dohaḷā;
anya-e0809n1:527_0: Ākaṅkhā ruci vuttā sā, tvadhikā lālasā dvisu.
anya-e0809n1:529_0: Veraṁ virodho viddeso, doso ca paṭighañca vā;
anya-e0809n1:533_0: Baddhavera mupanāho, siyā soko tu socanaṁ;
anya-e0809n1:536_0: Bhītitthi bhaya muttāso, bheravaṁ tu mahabbhayaṁ;
anya-e0809n1:539_0: Ghoraṁ paṭibhayaṁ bhesmaṁ, bhayaṅkara mime tīsu.
anya-e0809n1:541_0: Issā usūyā maccheraṁ, tu macchariya maccharaṁ;
anya-e0809n1:542_0: Moho’vijjā tathā’ñāṇaṁ, māno vidhā ca unnati.
anya-e0809n1:544_0: Uddhacca muddhaṭaṁ cātha uddhavaṁuddhaṁ dhāvati citta metenāti uddhavaṁ (ṭīkā), tāpo kukkuccameva ca;
anya-e0809n1:548_0: Dveḷhakaṁ vicikicchā ca, kaṅkhā saṅkā vimatyapi.
anya-e0809n1:551_0: Nicchayo niṇṇayo vutto, paṭiññā tu paṭissavo.
anya-e0809n1:554_0: Parābhavo pya’ vaññā tha, ummādo cittavibbhamo.
anya-e0809n1:556_0: Pemaṁ sineho sneho tha, cittapīḷā visaññitā;
anya-e0809n1:559_0: Vilāso lalitaṁ līlā, hāvo heḷā ca vibbhamo;
anya-e0809n1:562_0: Hasanaṁ hasitaṁ hāso, mando so mihitaṁ sitaṁ;
anya-e0809n1:566_0: Parihāso davo khiḍḍā, keḷi kīḷā ca kīḷitaṁ;
anya-e0809n1:567_0: Niddā tu supinaṁ soppaṁ, middhañca pacalāyikā.
anya-e0809n1:569_0: Thiyaṁ nikati kūṭañca, dambho sāṭhyañca ketavaṁ;
anya-e0809n1:570_0: Sabhāvo tu nissaggo ca, sarūpaṁ pakatitthiyaṁ.
